name: The Alchemist
title: A magical story about following your dreams and finding your personal legend.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
title: A timeless story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

name: Pride and Prejudice
title: Jane Austen's masterpiece of wit, romance, and social commentary.
George Orwell's chilling vision of a totalitarian future.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
title: How Homo sapiens became the dominant species on Earth.

name: The Guns of August
title: The outbreak of World War I and the first month of fighting.

name: A People's History of the United States
title: American history from the perspective of ordinary people and marginalized groups.

name: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
title: The true story of how one woman's cells revolutionized medical science.

name: Cosmos
title: Carl Sagan's journey through the universe and our place in it.

name: The Origin of Species
title: Darwin's groundbreaking theory of evolution by natural selection.

name: A Short History of Nearly Everything
title: Bill Bryson's humorous take on the history of science and discovery.

name: The Psychology of Money
title: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.

name: The Interpretation of Dreams
title: Freud's revolutionary exploration of the unconscious mind.

name: Man's Search for Meaning
title: Viktor Frankl's profound insights from his experiences in Nazi concentration camps.

name: Steve Jobs
title: Walter Isaacson's definitive biography of the Apple co-founder.

name: Long Walk to Freedom
title: Nelson Mandela's autobiography of his journey from activist to president.

name: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin
title: The founding father's account of his life and philosophy.

name: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
title: Stephen Covey's timeless principles for personal and professional success.

name: Atomic Habits
title: James Clear's guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

name: How to Win Friends and Influence People
title: Dale Carnegie's classic guide to interpersonal skills and leadership.

name: The Power of Now
title: Eckhart Tolle's spiritual guide to living in the present moment.

name: The Wealth of Nations
title: Adam Smith's foundational work on economics and capitalism.

name: Meditations
title: Marcus Aurelius's personal reflections on Stoic philosophy and leadership.
